column3: ACK. Also ping @droark You might be interested in this fix.

@MarcoFalke - Thanks for the heads up.\n\n@practicalswift - Have you tested this? I had to alter a few lines before the script worked as expected. (Granted, I hadn't tested the code in question, so thanks!) I can post the patch and you can squash the commit.
@droark Please post your patch and I'll incorporate it :-)
@practicalswift - Actually, since your patch just uncovers underlying issues, it's probably best for this PR to be closed and I file a larger PR that incorporates your fix. Cool?
@practicalswift - Filed #9580. This PR can be closed now. Thanks.
